original_text: But your life will be safe with me. You will not lose even one hair from your head.

sentences.original_text: But your life will be safe with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신의 생명은 나와 함께 안전할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will not lose even one hair from your head
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 머리카락 하나도 잃지 않을 것입니다
